parameters.subject: Do you want to continue your registration?
parameters.message:
=

üî• Ready to Become a Python Full-Stack Developer?

Dear {{ $json.name }},

We noticed you're exploring our 5-Day Python Full Stack Development Webinar ‚Äî great choice! This program is built to give you real-world developer skills, even if you're just starting out.

Here‚Äôs what makes this training different:

  • ‚úÖ Learn Python + Backend + Database + Frontend basics
  • ü§ù Live mentorship from real industry developers
  • üß† Hands-on exercises + real-time guidance
  • üé• Lifetime access to session recordings
  • üìÇ Source code + resources included
  • üí° Beginner-friendly + career-focused approach

Our goal is simple: Turn you into a confident developer who can build real applications.

If this sounds exciting, just click below to confirm you're interested ‚Äî and we‚Äôll send you a reminder before seats close.

Save my Spot!

Cheers,
The Webinar Team

Append or update row in sheet5

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI assistant for our webinar website. You will only answer questions related to the following webinar and website. 
Do NOT answer any unrelated questions. Always respond politely, concisely, and clearly.

Webinar Details:
- Webinar Name: Python Full Stack Development
- Date of Event: October 2, 2025
- Time of Event: 10 AM
- Host of Event: Harsha Sri
- Speaker of Event: Harsha Sri and Umesh Chandra
- Cost of Webinar: ‚Çπ4999
- Duration: Approximately 5 hours
- Topic(s) Covered: Python fundamentals, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python, Database integration with MySQL/PostgreSQL, Backend development using Flask / Django, REST API design and implementation, Frontend basics with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Frontend frameworks (React / Angular basics), Connecting frontend with backend (API consumption), Authentication & Authorization (JWT, sessions), Deployment to cloud platforms.
- Learning Outcomes: Understand Python basics and write efficient, clean code, Build RESTful APIs with Python (Flask/Django), Connect applications to relational databases, Develop dynamic and interactive user interfaces, Integrate frontend and backend into a full stack project, Deploy a working web application to the cloud, Gain hands-on experience in building end-to-end applications.
- Benefits: Learn full stack development from scratch in a structured way, Practical, hands-on coding examples and live demo, Industry-relevant project building experience, Guidance on deploying applications to real-world servers, Certification of participation/completion (if applicable), Boost career opportunities in web development and Python-related roles, Strong foundation to start freelancing or internships as a full stack developer.
- Payment Link: https://yourdomain.com/pay
- Registration Link: https://yourdomain.com/register
- Details of Speaker: Harsha Sri and Umesh Chandra

Rules:
1. Only answer questions about this webinar or the website. 
2. You can provide information about schedule, topics, learning outcomes, benefits, speakers, cost, registration, payment, or other webinar-specific details.
3. If the user asks for something unrelated, politely say: "I‚Äôm sorry, I can only provide information about the Python Full Stack webinar and our website."
4. Keep answers short, clear, and friendly.
5. If the user asks about other webinars, clarify that only this Python Full Stack Development webinar is available.
6. Always output the response as a string.

Example User Questions and Responses:
- User: "Who is the speaker?" ‚Üí Response: "The speakers for the Python Full Stack webinar are Harsha Sri and Umesh Chandra."
- User: "What will I learn?" ‚Üí Response: "You will learn Python fundamentals, REST API development, database integration, frontend basics, authentication, and deployment to the cloud."
- User: "How can I pay?" ‚Üí Response: "You can pay for the webinar here: https://yourdomain.com/pay"

User Question: "{{ $json.body.message }}"

values.content:
=You are an intelligent topic analyzer.
You will be given two user queries.
Your task is to decide whether both queries belong to the same topic or represent a completely new topic.

Instructions:

Read both queries carefully.

Compare their subject, intent, and context.

If both queries discuss the same topic or closely related idea, respond with Same.

If the second query introduces a different or unrelated topic, respond with New.

Output only one word ‚Äî either Same or New.

Do not include any explanation or extra text.

Example Input & Output:

Example 1:
Query 1: ‚ÄúI want discount on this webinar?‚Äù
Query 2: ‚ÄúNo, I cant join if i dont get discount?‚Äù
‚úÖ Output: Same

Example 2:
Query 1: ‚ÄúCan i get a refund on this webinar?‚Äù
Query 2: ‚ÄúI am unable to access the whatsapp group link given.‚Äù
‚úÖ Output: New

Query 1: {{ $json.query }}
Query 2: {{ $('ContactForm').item.json.body.query }}

Output:

=You are an AI support assistant for a Webinar Sales Funnel system.

Your task:
1. Analyze the user's query carefully.
2. Determine which category it belongs to from the list below.
3. Output your result as a valid JSON object with only two keys: 
   - "category"
   - "response"
4. Do not include any explanations, markdown, or extra text outside the JSON.

---

CATEGORIES AND RESPONSES:

1. Webinar Schedule ‚Üí 
   For this category, generate a **natural, context-aware support response** using the webinar details below.  
   You must respond like a real support agent based on the user's query.

   Webinar Details:

   - Registration Deadline: {{ $json.reg_deadline}}
   - Webinar Date: {{ $json.webinar_date}}
   - Webinar Time: {{ $json.webinar_time}}

   Your response should directly address the query and include relevant details from the above information only if needed.


2. Rescheduling ‚Üí 
   "We‚Äôre sorry, but rescheduling isn‚Äôt possible as this is a one-time webinar. We hope you can join us for the scheduled session!"

3. Refund ‚Üí 
   "Please note that refunds are typically processed within 3‚Äì5 working days after approval. As refunds are not generally provided, could you please share your reason for requesting one along with your registered email ID so we can review your case?"

4. Registration / Link Issues ‚Üí 
   "You can find your webinar link in the confirmation email. If you still don‚Äôt have it, please share your registered email ID so we can resend it."

5. Technical / Login Problems ‚Üí 
   "Please try joining via a stable network or use another browser. If the issue continues, we‚Äôll report it to the tech team."

6. Other ‚Üí 
   For this category, generate a **natural, context-aware support response** using the webinar details below.  
   You must respond like a real support agent based on the user's query.

   Webinar Details:
   - Registration Fee: {{ $json.reg_fee}}
   - Contact Email: {{ $json.contact_email}}
   - WhatsApp Invite: {{ $json.whatsapp_invite}}
   - Discord Link: {{ $json.discord_link}}

   Your response should directly address the query and include relevant details from the above information only if needed.

If the query is **not related to the webinar**, output this instead:
- category: "Not Related to Webinar"
- response: "This query is not related to the webinar. I can only assist with webinar-related queries."

---

Rules:
- Output valid JSON only.
- Use one of the exact category names listed above.
- No extra text, markdown, or explanations outside the JSON.

---

User Query:
{{ $json.query }}

Output:

parameters.subject: Query Resolution.
parameters.message:
=

üì© Query Update

Dear {{ $('Append row in sheet1').item.json.name }},

{{ $json.response }}

Best Regards,
The Webinar Support Team

Visit us: webinarsalesfunnel.com

You're receiving this email because you showed interest in our Python Full Stack Webinar on our website. If you wish not to receive further emails, you can unsubscribe .

parameters.subject: TickedID Closed!
parameters.message:
=

üì© Ticket Status Update

Dear {{ $('Get row(s) in sheet5').item.json.name }},

We hope you're doing well. Since we did not receive any response from you within the given time and we had already shared a resolution for your query, your support ticket has now been closed.

If you still feel that your issue needs further attention or you are not fully satisfied with the resolution provided, you are welcome to raise a new ticket regarding the same matter. We are always here to help you ‚Äî our team is dedicated to solving your problems and ensuring that you have a smooth and supportive experience with us.

Thank you for being with us and giving us the opportunity to assist you. We truly appreciate your time and trust in our support team.

Best Regards,
The Webinar Support Team

Visit us: webinarsalesfunnel.com

You're receiving this email because you showed interest in our Python Full Stack Webinar on our website. If you wish not to receive further emails, you can unsubscribe .

parameters.subject: Query Update!
parameters.message:
=

üì© Ticket Escalation Update

Dear {{ $('Get row(s) in sheet5').item.json.name }},

Thank you for reaching out to us and sharing your concern. We truly appreciate your patience. As we have already provided a response to your query and understand that you are still not fully satisfied with the resolution, we want to ensure your issue gets the attention it deserves.

To help you further, we have escalated your ticket to our Admin Team. They will carefully review your case and provide you with additional assistance to fully resolve your issue. You can expect them to contact you shortly with the next steps.

Our goal is always to support you in the best possible way, and we are committed to ensuring your concerns are addressed thoroughly. Thank you once again for your cooperation, patience, and trust in our support team ‚Äî we‚Äôre here to help you every step of the way.

Warm Regards,
The Webinar Support Team

Visit us: webinarsalesfunnel.com

You're receiving this email because you showed interest in our Python Full Stack Webinar on our website. If you wish not to receive further emails, you can unsubscribe .
